DOC.brief_title: Changes Quadriceps Function Following Local Distant Interventions Individuals With Patellofemoral Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Interventions PFPS usually focus strengthen quadriceps muscle hip musculature . It suggest intervention program specifically address muscle inhibition beyond typical strengthening exercise . To specifically address decreased muscle activation transcutaneous electrical neuromuscular stimulation ( TENS ) , apply knee , show reduce pain increase muscle activation individual knee osteoarthritis . Interventions include joint manipulation apply distant site , lumbopelvic region also show increase muscle activation follow intervention individual PFPS , duration effect unknown . It hypothesize intervention alter spinal afferent signal may effect efferent motor output . Since lumbopelvic region knee joint share common nerve root level possible intervention apply either site may influence efferent motor output quadriceps muscle . The magnitude duration effect unknown . Both TENS lumbopelvic manipulation also show reduce pain exercise individual knee joint pathology . This study would better determine magnitude effective pain reduction intervention apply knee joint distant site , lumbopelvic region .
DOC.criteria: Age 1550 year Insidious onset patellofemoral pain last great 1 month duration Unilateral Bilateral knee pain dysfunction least two follow symptom : patella compression , squat , prolonged sitting , go stair , isometric quadriceps contraction .
